Advanced features for Plug.DJ!

Seamless integration allows you to supercharge Plug.DJ without scratching your head. Plug X offers the most features out of any extension on the market. Oh yeah, it's free too!

Download for Chrome »

News

I'm going to be releasing a big update soon. Tons of new items. Keep at look out!

Installation

Installing Plug X couldn't be any simpler. Just click on the download button up top or visit the Chrome Store page to download.

Tips & Tricks

Plug X has commands built in that let you access a plethora of features. To view the list of commands, type:

/commands

Automuting songs is an unique feature of Plug X, but is only accessible through commands at the moment.

To automute the current song, type:

/automute

To remove the current song from your automuted list, type:

/removemute

A quick way to check which version of the extension you have is with the command:

/version

Video/Audio stream can quickly be turned on or off with a simple command:

/stream on
/stream off

Planned Features

What I plan on adding in the not too distant future.

Who MEHd? - [Partially Implemented] Show the MEH icon next to the user's name if they Meh

Send to Bottom - Move a song to the bottom of the playlist instead of dragging it around

Firefox Port - Spread the love to other browsers

Multi Language Support - Translate the extension into popular languages used on Plug.DJ

Have a feature suggestion? Submit it here.

Credits

This extension has evolved greatly since its initial release. I went back and rewrote the entire extension from the ground up to improve usability, performance, and integration.

Plug X currently uses a handful of frameworks and plugins:

  • RequireJS
  • Backbone
  • jQuery
  • Handlebars
  • Underscore
  • Magnific Popup
  • Spectrum

Features

  • Custom Chat Popout
  • AutoWoot
  • AutoJoin
  • AFK Timers
  • Video Visibility
  • Upload Custom Backgrounds

  • Inline Chat Images
  • 'Unable to Play' Popup Blocker

  • Chat Emoji Suggestions

  • Automute Songs
